price: 19 tandis que ceux qui renient Nos signes sont voués à l’Enfer.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
